column5: Finally, I bought my new kayak for fishing and paddling. It's wildness Pamlico double Kayak and I just paid $450 include 2 paddles.  It is used but perfect condition.
Sweet dude! Can't wait to see the "pimped out" pictures when you load that puppy up with gadgets!
That was a great deal you got there. Does it convert for solo use as well?
Of cause it could be solo Kayak.  Front seat can be moved backward for solo Kayaking.
cool ride.  before you know it, it'll be pimpin like jedi's Yak.  Not my cup of tea when it comes to fishing, but it sure as heck beats fishing from shore!  Hope you enjoy the new ride.  Cheers, UF

You should come see us at yakfisher.net. We have a member who has a Pam 130T that he has pimped out with everything you can imagine. He even has a battery powered bilge pump to get rid of water that gets in from rain or high waves. We also have a virtual derby contest with great prizes.
